reg_info.act_under: Safe Access to Abortion Services Act, 2017

content.content: 1. For information purposes, (a) the names and locations of the clinics in Ontario are set out in Table 1; (b) the access zone established under section 6 of the Act for each clinic is the property on which the clinic is located and the area around the property, as described in Table 1, subject to subsection 6 (5) of the Act; and (c) for each property referred to in clause (b) on which a clinic is located, Table 1 sets out the Property Identification Number for the property and the Land Registry Office number for the Land Titles Division or Registry Division in which the property is located.
content.raw_html:
1. For information purposes,

(a) the names and locations of the clinics in Ontario are set out in Table 1;

(b) the access zone established under section 6 of the Act for each clinic is the property on which the clinic is located and the area around the property, as described in Table 1, subject to subsection 6 (5) of the Act; and

(c) for each property referred to in clause (b) on which a clinic is located, Table 1 sets out the Property Identification Number for the property and the Land Registry Office number for the Land Titles Division or Registry Division in which the property is located.

content.content:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). Table 1    Names and locations of clinics in Ontario Item   Name and address of clinic   Municipality   Extent of access zone   Property Identification Number and Land Registry Office number 

  1   Brampton Women’s Clinic 2250 Bovaird Drive East, Suite 602   Brampton   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   19872-0253 (LT) - LRO #43 

  2   Mississauga Women’s Clinic 101 Queensway West, Suite 401   Mississauga   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   13353-0121 (LT) - LRO #43 

  3   The Morgentaler Clinic 65 Bank Street   Ottawa   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   04115-0009 (LT) - LRO #4 

  4   Bloor West Village Women’s Clinic 2425 Bloor Street West, Suite 403   Toronto   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   21387-0012 (LT) - LRO #66 

  5   Cabbagetown Women’s Clinic 302 Gerrard Street East   Toronto   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   21082-0282 (LT) - LRO #66 

  6   Choice in Health Clinic 1678 Bloor Street West, Suite 301   Toronto   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   21352-0230 (LT)  - LRO #66 

  7   The Morgentaler Clinic 727 Hillsdale Avenue East   Toronto   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   21127-0296 (LT) - LRO #66 

  8   Women’s Care Clinic 960 Lawrence Avenue West, Suite 501   Toronto   The area within 50 metres from the boundaries of the property   10237-0046 (LT) - LRO #66   Français
